## Problem

What problem does this feature solve? Or what improvement does it bring?

## Proposed Solution

Describe your proposed solution or approach.

## Alternatives Considered

Any alternative approaches you have considered.

## Additional Context

Any other context, mockups, or examples that help explain the request.
